mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*)+1 Sales_Packing_No FROM Sales_Packing_tbl WHERE Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo = #{Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo}

SELECT spt.Sales_Packing_No, spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo, spt.Sales_Packing_Qty, lmt.LM_ItemCode as Sales_Packing_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name as Sales_Packing_Name, lmt.LM_Create_Date as Sales_Small_Create_Date FROM Sales_Packing_tbl spt INNER JOIN LotMaster_tbl lmt ON spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo = lmt.LM_LotNo INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code WHERE spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo = #{LotNo} AND spt.Sales_Packing_Status = '203'

SELECT spt.Sales_Packing_No, spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo, spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo, spt.Sales_Packing_Qty, lmt.LM_ItemCode as Sales_Packing_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name as Sales_Packing_Name, lmt.LM_Create_Date as Sales_Small_Create_Date, pit.Product_Item_Name AS Sales_Packing_Name, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 AS Sales_Packing_STND_1, pit.Product_Info_STND_2 AS Sales_Packing_STND_2, dt.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Item_Clsfc_1, spt.Sales_Packing_Status, dt2.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Status_Name FROM Sales_Packing_tbl spt INNER JOIN LotMaster_tbl lmt ON spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo = lmt.LM_LotNo INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON spt.Sales_Packing_Status = dt2.Child_TBL_No WHERE
lmt.LM_ItemCode like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
and spt.Sales_Packing_Status = #{ItemSendClsfc}
ORDER BY spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time

SELECT spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo, -1*spt.Sales_Packing_Qty as Sales_Packing_Qty, sit.Sales_InMat_Code as Sales_Packing_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name as Sales_Packing_Name, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 as Sales_Packing_STND_1, pit.Product_Info_STND_2 as Sales_Packing_STND_2, dt.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_Packing_Item_Clsfc_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_Packing_Unit, dt3.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_Packing_Status_Name, dt4.Child_TBL_Type Sales_Packing_Item_Clsfc_2, dt5.Child_TBL_Type Sales_Packing_Material, spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time, sit.Sales_InMat_Date as Sales_Packing_Return_Date, sit.Sales_InMat_Modifier as Sales_Packing_Modifier FROM Sales_Packing_tbl spt INNER JOIN Sales_InMat_tbl sit ON spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo = sit.Sales_InMat_Lot_No INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON sit.Sales_InMat_Code = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Unit = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON spt.Sales_Packing_Status = dt3.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt4 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt4.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt5 ON pit.Product_Material = dt5.Child_TBL_No
WHERE sit.Sales_InMat_Date >= #{startDate} and sit.Sales_InMat_Date < #{endDate} AND sit.Sales_InMat_Qty < 0 AND spt.Sales_Packing_Status = '207'
AND sit.Sales_InMat_Code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
ORDER BY spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time

SELECT spt.Sales_Packing_No, spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo, spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo, sum(spt.Sales_Packing_Qty) Sales_Packing_Qty, lmt.LM_ItemCode as Sales_Packing_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name as Sales_Packing_Name, lmt.LM_Create_Date as Sales_Small_Create_Date, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 AS Sales_Packing_STND_1, dt4.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Material, dt.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Item_Clsfc_1, dt3.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Item_Clsfc_2, spt.Sales_Packing_Status, dt2.Child_TBL_Type AS Sales_Packing_Status_Name, spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time FROM Sales_Packing_tbl spt INNER JOIN LotMaster_tbl lmt ON spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo = lmt.LM_LotNo INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON spt.Sales_Packing_Status = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt3.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt4 ON pit.Product_Material = dt4.Child_TBL_No
WHERE spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time >= #{startDate} and spt.Sales_Large_Packing_Time < #{endDate}
AND Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo like concat('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND lmt.LM_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
GROUP BY spt.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo

SELECT spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo, spt.Production_LotNo, sum(spt.Qty) Qty, spt.MachineCode, eit.Equipment_Info_Name MachineName, spt.ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name as ItemName, spt.Create_Date, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 AS ItemSTND1, pit.Product_Info_STND_2 as ItemSTND2, dt4.Child_TBL_Type AS ItemMaterial_Name, dt.Child_TBL_Type AS ItemClsfc1_Name, dt3.Child_TBL_Type AS ItemClsfc2_Name, sit.Sales_InMat_Modifier Modifier FROM Small_Packaging_tbl spt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON spt.ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt3.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt4 ON pit.Product_Material = dt4.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON spt.MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code LEFT OUTER JOIN Sales_InMat_tbl sit ON spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo = sit.Sales_InMat_Lot_No
WHERE spt.Create_Date >= #{startDate} and spt.Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo like concat('%',#{LotNo},'%')
GROUP BY spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo
mapper.insert: insert into Sales_Packing_tbl( Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo, Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo, Sales_ItemCode, Sales_MachineCode, Sales_Packing_Qty, Sales_Packing_Status ) select #{LotNo}, A.Small_Packaging_LotNo, #{ItemCode}, #{MachineCode}, sum(A.Qty) Qty, '203' from Small_Packaging_tbl A left outer join Sales_Packing_tbl B on A.Small_Packaging_LotNo = B.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo where B.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo is null group by Small_Packaging_LotNo;
